duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the day-to-day operations of the food pantry, including shopping, planning, and pantry bag preparation.
Ensure food safety standards and maintain high hygiene standards.
Travel to vendors to purchase food pantry items occasionally.
Training and directing volunteers to serve effectively.
Track, coordinate, and guide site volunteers.
Respond to requests for information regarding the food pantry promptly.
Attend administrative team meetings and coordinate training events for food pantry volunteers.
Keep accurate food pantry records and complete monthly food pantry reports.
Coordinate additional pantry sites and perform other duties as assigned.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent, valid state driver's license with clean DMV record and current car insurance
